A4.text: The Republicans lost their majority in the 2018 House of Representatives elections, and Scalise was elected as House minority whip, with Kevin McCarthy of California as Minority Leader.

A5.text: Scalise was elected as House minority whip, with Kevin McCarthy of California as Minority Leader.
